scenes.background: Bob looks frustrated, Monica seems thoughtful.
scenes.description: Sometimes it feels like were always playing catch-up with these emergencies.

options.text: It can be overwhelming, Bob. Let's brainstorm how we can improve our response times.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's frustration and suggest a proactive approach, showing good perception and social skills, but self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: I get it, Bob. Sometimes we just need to take a step back and assess our priorities.
options.analysis: You empathize with Bob's feelings and suggest taking a step back, showing good self-regulation but could improve on perception and empathy.

options.text: We can't predict everything, Bob. Maybe we need to accept that some chaos is inevitable.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the unpredictability of emergencies, showing good empathy but lower in motivation and perception.
